column5: Looking to find a resort to stay at with my family in 2019. Considering LOTW because of distance, would like to bring my own boat and sounds like the lake is mapped with the LOTW Lakemaster chip. From the research I have done itâ€™s sounds like Yellow Girl Bay is a good place for Walleyes. Are there resorts in somewhat close proximity? We are looking for clean cabins with good fishing and a few resort activities as a bonus. Swimming especially. Thanks for the advise in advance.
Steve and Witchbay runs a fantastic resort. That puts you in the Yellow Girl Bay area...http://www.witchbay.com/
Call Matt at Crawfords in Sioux Narrows
Tomahawk in Sioux Narrows is excellent. Might be a bit of a run but the cabins are top notch.

Crawford's is a nice place. Yellowgirl I think might be a good early season spot, but when I fished it last week if June we were better off in the big water past yellowgirl rock by a few miles. That's a long run from Sioux Narrows. Just something to consider. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk Pro
Fished YG today, nice 16 inch eyes, big bay can be windy but lots of other places to fish in the SN area as well. The resort you choose will help with those places.
